content.raw:
Yes, [Louise](https://bitbucket.org/chapulina/) mentions above that she is going to fix the frame issue.  However, even relative to the neck, not all the lights should have a positive Z component.  I wonder if these values are reported in the world frame-- they make more sense in that frame.  Will look over the code tomorrow.

Note that the head frame is inverted, but we had instructions in issue #29 to invert the image and report the position relative to the head in the Gazebo world, not the ROS frame.
